text:
International Student Support, Advice and Compliance (ISSAC)
The University of Sheffield
For details on how to contact us via livechat, phone or to visit us in person:
https://www.sheffield.ac.uk/new-students/immigration/student-visa-application/contact-us
For more information on study related immigration matters:
https://www.sheffield.ac.uk/new-students/immigration
We want to hear about your experience of using our immigration service. Please take a few moments to complete our feedback form to help us improve what we do: https://docs.google.com/a/sheffield.ac.uk/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjlfNyhNMAdNFf6Dsi9gWmMTENCmRspYHunGKPw6IlW4wxig/viewform
If you're a current student at the University of Sheffield, connect with other students on Umii:
https://students.sheffield.ac.uk/support-hub/umii
trans:
유학생 지원, 상담 그리고 준수 (ISSAC)
셰필드 대학
저희에게 라이브 채팅, 전화 또는 직접 방문하심으로써 연락을 취하기 위한 자세한 방법은:
https://www.sheffield.ac.uk/new-students/immigration/student-visa-application/contact-us
이민 문제들과 관련된 연구를 위한 더 자세한 정보는:
https://www.sheffield.ac.uk/new-students/immigration
저희의 이민 서비스를 사용하신 당신의 경험에 관하여 듣고 싶습니다. 저희가 하는 일을 더 잘하도록 돕기 위하여 잠깐의 시간을 들여서 저희의 피드백 양식을 작성해 주세요 : https://docs.google.com/a/sheffield.ac.uk/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjlfNyhNMAdNFf6Dsi9gWmMTENCmRspYHunGKPw6IlW4wxig/viewform
당신이 현재 셰필드 대학의 학생이라면, Umii에서 다른 학생들과 연락을 취하세요:
https://students.sheffield.ac.uk/support-hub/umii
